about_the_game:
Space Ark is a new kind of Shoot' Em Up

Multiplayer battles and lobby, with spaceship customization places & multiple interest zones where you can meet your mates & share your fights stories.

Multiplayer will offer you epic competitive battles with your friends

Destroy your friends in epic spaceship battles and steal their points in order to enhance & personalize your own ship once you return to your base.
With some time, maybe you will reach the best rank among the champions.

Arcade mode will have real storytelling and plot

Levels will offer you many kinds of gameplay, but also a real story and a true goal.
Control your spacehip through large waves of enemy, and try to stay alive until the end of the stage.
Each completed level, will bring you a bonus, a new ship or another kind of reward.

Some secrets will also be present, it's up to you to discover them before the others...

The enemy will have no mercy


Your journey will be difficult, are you going to be the savior or a coward?

  • Story mode
  • Multiplayer battles and lobby, with spaceship customization places & multiples interest zones
  • Ranking system
  • Electro/Synthwave/Retro ambiance & music

Join us on Discord!




Join the little community now, and stay in touch with the dev.

When the demo comes out, share with us your ideas & get involved in the development!
You may be rewarded for your participation!
